channel.title: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?
channel.description:
Well, back in the day. I used to get random people, and ask if they wanted to make a pure 'twin' account with me. This means, similar or almost exact username, same skill, same level everything.
I want to create a pure ranged or mage account with somebody. [b]Anybody in?[/b] No botting allowed, I want to do it with my bare hand.
More than one, maybe even a group. I can supply the basic equipment, or if you want too you can supply.

item.title: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Tom_BETA:

Honestly, I bot because I find the game boring. I didn’t mind playing in 2007 because it was fun. If the game was remotely entertaining I would not bot!

I only still play because I have a open area with willows and a tinderbox, it relaxes me at the end of the day.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?

item.title: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Honestly, I bot because I find the game boring. I didn’t mind playing in 2007 because it was fun. If the game was remotely entertaining I would not bot!

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:14, topic:407796”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=509083.msg3693432#msg3693432 date=1312273287]
lol 2007 newfags
[/quote]
Pfft I was a new fag in 2003 ;), that was just my first scamming account, we made kids cry. ;D[/quote]

Oh really

moral-stare-life-time-human-nature-control-mind-power-clint-demotivational-poster-1243617827.jpg640×640

item.title: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Speljohan:

lol 2007 newfags

Pfft I was a new fag in 2003 ;), that was just my first scamming account, we made kids cry. ;D

[quote=“mr extremez, post:10, topic:407796”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=509083.msg3693407#msg3693407 date=1312270858]
Lol I remember in 2007 me and my cousin made identical accounts named Mr Trust, and we played a game where if you trusted us with your most valuable items you could win 5m and your items back. Lol omg and we would get like sets of iron and just start running. xD
[/quote]
Even back in 07 i dont remember iron being very vaulable lol.[/quote]
Ik haha, its just that’s the most valuable thing we ever got from doing that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I remember a time when i was killing cow’s in lummy, then this guy comes up and start’s cussing (he was saying fuck and all that and it wasn’t being censored.) and he said ‘if you give me your black armor I’ll tell you how to’ and if my friend wasn’t beside me I would have done it.

item.title: Anybody want to try and re-live 2007 with me for a few days?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:6, topic:407796”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=509083.msg3693267#msg3693267 date=1312259174]

I would, but i’d be botting. RS sucks and I only like pking. Not all the training and such that comes with it.

Rs was fun before people like you came in and started botting and were to lazy to train…

Ontopic: How high are you raising these accounts?
[/quote]

Explain to me how my alching at soul wars takes anything away from you. I’m curious to know.[/quote]
You dont but most people that bot camp every training spot there is, there all infested with bots now and hard for normal players to play.

Read full topic
